alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kane County through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Kanab. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Kane County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
